title: Easily the worst patch ever
body:
So many broken champs. Nothing says huge damage, cc chains, high tank like an untested patch.

My question is; does the owners of Riot now work on behalf of dota2 ? Cause this is pathetic.
Oh and also, 1 item maokai does 500 ap damage saplings... to each team member. 
Oh well played dota2

replies.body: maybe not worst but overtuned champions and loaded kits always makes it feel like it if they take advantage of changes
